welcome.title: Three countries, one goal - victory!
welcome.description: Join the epic battle of three powers in the world of Lineage 2! Choose your side, fight for honor and power, conquer territories and become a legend on the battlefield. Your fate is decided here!
welcome.start: Just a few steps away to start your adventure

download-modal.title: Download Launcher
download-modal.description: The launcher is your key to adventures in the world of epic fantasy! Download it to install the game, receive regular updates and enjoy flawless gaming experience.
download-modal.footer-text: After downloading the launcher file, Launcher.exe, create a new folder and move the Launcher.exe file into it. Then run it as an administrator to avoid any possible access rights issues and ensure correct installation.
